title: <1>Stack</1>
description:
I am an enthusiast of agile development methodologies that produce low-cost and high-performance solutions.

By thinking in this way, I adopt technologies that guarantee these characteristics in the development without sacrificing the quality and stability of the service.

In addition, my stack is focused on Javascript/Typescript and Docker, which reduces the team's learning curve and facilitates the configuration of the work environment.

list.name: ReactJS
list.description: Framework for Front-end and WebApp projects.
